Sentencas: Electrochemical Impedance Spectroscopy (EIS) is extensively used to characterize Solid Oxide Cells (SOCs) to extract information on the elementary loss mechanisms.
Titulo: Model-assisted identification of solid oxide cell elementary processes by electrochemical impedance spectroscopy measurements

Sentencas: However, these individual mechanisms usually overlap in the frequency domain, requiring dedicated data processing for unambiguous identification.
Titulo: Model-assisted identification of solid oxide cell elementary processes by electrochemical impedance spectroscopy measurements

Sentencas: A powerful method for discriminating process contributions is the analysis by the Distribution of Relaxation Times (DRT).
Titulo: Model-assisted identification of solid oxide cell elementary processes by electrochemical impedance spectroscopy measurements

Sentencas: The de-convoluted spectrum of SOC generally presents, six peaks from mHz to hundreds of kHz.
Titulo: Model-assisted identification of solid oxide cell elementary processes by electrochemical impedance spectroscopy measurements

Sentencas: DRT peak-to-process attribution is often obtained by experimental sensitivity analysis.
Titulo: Model-assisted identification of solid oxide cell elementary processes by electrochemical impedance spectroscopy measurements

Sentencas: In the study, six parameters have been systematically varied: temperature, current density, partial pressure of O-2 at the oxygen electrode, partial pressure of steam at the fuel electrode, total flow rates and fuel composition.
Titulo: Model-assisted identification of solid oxide cell elementary processes by electrochemical impedance spectroscopy measurements

Sentencas: The effect of wires inductance and different cell geometries has also been analyzed.
Titulo: Model-assisted identification of solid oxide cell elementary processes by electrochemical impedance spectroscopy measurements

Sentencas: The study provides detailed information about the contribution of the elementary processes to the total losses over a wide range of operation regimes.
Titulo: Model-assisted identification of solid oxide cell elementary processes by electrochemical impedance spectroscopy measurements

Sentencas: It further refines peak-to process attributions by using a dynamic numerical model that includes gas and solid phase transport coupled with charge transfer and chemical reactions.
Titulo: Model-assisted identification of solid oxide cell elementary processes by electrochemical impedance spectroscopy measurements

Sentencas: Moreover, the non-univocal literature attribution of processes in the middle frequency range is clarified: strongly overlapping peaks cannot be separated even by DRT.
Titulo: Model-assisted identification of solid oxide cell elementary processes by electrochemical impedance spectroscopy measurements
